title: Understanding Nutritional Deficiency
text: Nutritional deficiency occurs when the body doesn't get enough essential nutrients. These nutrients are vital for maintaining health and supporting bodily functions.

title: Identifying Essential Nutrients
text: Essential nutrients include vitamins, minerals, proteins, fats, and carbohydrates. A deficiency in any of these can lead to health issues.

hintAnswer: fatigue, weakness, and poor immune function
title: Recognizing Symptoms of Nutritional Deficiency
text: What are some common symptoms of nutritional deficiency?
choices: fatigue, weakness, and poor immune function
increased energy levels and improved mood
rapid weight gain and increased appetite

title: Linking ARFID to Nutritional Deficiency
text: $$\frac{Avoidant}{restrictive}$$ food intake disorder (ARFID) can lead to nutritional deficiencies because individuals with ARFID often avoid certain foods, leading to a lack of essential nutrients.

hintAnswer: there is a reduction in essential nutrients needed to maintain adequate bodily functions
title: Defining Nutritional Deficiency
text: What is the definition of nutritional deficiency?
choices: there is a reduction in essential nutrients needed to maintain adequate bodily functions
a newer eating disorder characterized as a disturbance with eating or feeding where nutritional or energy needs are continuously not met
starting of oral intake for clients with anorexia
